AI Engineer & Data Analyst passionate about building robust ML solutions, NLP workflows, and public writing. Open to collaboration and new opportunities.

  • Focused on real-world threat detection
Data Analyst

  • Created visual dashboards for policy stakeholders

Projects

  • Customer Churn Forecasting – GitHub
    XGBoost-based churn model with LangChain + NLP analysis. CLI for retention insights.
  • AI Text-to-Voice Summary Converter – GitHub
    Converts LLM summaries into audio output. Uses Gradio + Python.
  • Cryptocurrency Forecasting – GitHub
    Facebook Prophet-based time series model for BTC/ETH forecasting.
  • Loan Eligibility Prediction – GitHub
    Predictive modeling using Logistic Regression + ensemble models.
  • Object Detection using Hugging Face – GitHub
    Fine-tuned object detection pipeline using Hugging Face transformers.
  • Real Estate Price Prediction – GitHub
    Regression model for home prices with EDA & hyperparameter tuning.
  • Malware Binary Classification Tool – GitHub
    CLI-based static malware classifier using ML for PE files (from CSE project).
